roleset.name: accuse of a crime

example.name: just arg1
example.text: The issue has come to a boil in Newark, N.J., where federal prosecutors have warned lawyers for Eddie Antar that if the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc. is indicted *trace*, the government may move to seize the money that Mr. Antar is using to pay legal fees.
example.arg: the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc.

example.name: also with crime
example.text: The former executives were indicted last October on charges of fraud, theft and conspiracy related to efforts by the company to win $400 million in Postal Service contracts.
example.arg: on charges of fraud, theft and conspiracy related to efforts by the company to win $400 million in Postal Service contracts.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: the indictment of Vice President Cheney's former chief of staff
example.arg: of Vice President Cheney's former chief of staff

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: Their original indictment against Mr. Wittgreen , the friend ofMr. Noriega , and the other four
example.arg: against Mr. Wittgreen , the friend ofMr. Noriega , and the other four

roleset.note: INDICT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls judgement-33. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from indict.01-v)
INDICTMENT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to indict.01. Vn class judgement-33. FN class notification_of_charges. Framed by Katie. (from indictment.01-n)
